instructions.name: close_compressed_attestation
docs: Close a compressed attestation.
Only allowed if schema config has closeable=true.

accounts.name: signer
docs: Signer must be either the agent (NFT owner via ATA) or the counterparty

accounts.name: schema_config
docs: Schema config PDA

accounts.name: agent_ata
docs: Optional: Agent's ATA (required if signer is NFT owner, not counterparty).
If provided, must hold the agent NFT (mint matches token_account from data).
Note: token_account in data is the MINT address; this is the holder's ATA.

accounts.name: token_program
docs: Token-2022 program for ATA verification (optional, required with agent_ata)

instructions.name: close_regular_attestation
docs: Close a regular (SAS) attestation.
Only allowed if schema config has closeable=true.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Payer receives rent back

accounts.name: signer
docs: Signer must be either the agent (NFT owner via ATA) or the counterparty

accounts.name: schema_config
docs: Schema config PDA

accounts.name: sati_pda
docs: SATI Attestation Program PDA - authorized signer on SAS credential

accounts.name: sati_credential
docs: SATI SAS credential account

accounts.name: attestation
docs: Attestation account to be closed

accounts.name: sas_program
docs: SAS program

accounts.name: agent_ata
docs: Optional: Agent's ATA (required if signer is NFT owner, not counterparty).
If provided, must hold the agent NFT (mint matches token_account from data).
Note: token_account in data is the MINT address; this is the holder's ATA.

accounts.name: token_program
docs: Token-2022 program for ATA verification (optional, required with agent_ata)

instructions.name: create_compressed_attestation
docs: Create a compressed attestation via Light Protocol.
Verifies Ed25519 signatures via instruction introspection.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Payer for transaction fees

accounts.name: schema_config
docs: Schema config PDA

accounts.name: instructions_sysvar
docs: Instructions sysvar for Ed25519 signature verification

accounts.name: agent_ata
docs: Agent's ATA that holds the NFT - proves signer owns the agent identity.
Required for DualSignature and AgentOwnerSigned modes.
Optional for CounterpartySigned mode (not validated).
The mint must match token_account from attestation data (the agent's MINT address),
amount must be >= 1, and owner must match signatures[0].pubkey.
Note: token_account in data is the MINT address; this is the holder's ATA.

accounts.name: token_program
docs: Token-2022 program for ATA verification.
Required when agent_ata is provided.

accounts.name: delegation_attestation
docs: Delegation attestation (optional).
Required when signer != agent ATA owner for AgentOwnerSigned mode.
Must be a valid DelegateV1 SAS attestation proving the signer's delegation.

accounts.name: sati_credential
docs: SATI SAS credential for delegation PDA derivation.
Required when delegation_attestation is provided.

accounts.name: clock
docs: Clock sysvar for delegation expiry verification.
Required when delegation_attestation is provided.

instructions.name: create_regular_attestation
docs: Create a regular attestation via SAS.
Used for ReputationScore which requires on-chain queryability.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Payer for account creation

accounts.name: schema_config
docs: Schema config PDA

accounts.name: sati_pda
docs: SATI Attestation Program PDA - authorized signer on SAS credential

accounts.name: sati_credential
docs: SATI SAS credential account

accounts.name: sas_schema
docs: SAS schema account

accounts.name: attestation
docs: Attestation PDA to be created

accounts.name: instructions_sysvar
docs: Instructions sysvar for Ed25519 signature verification

accounts.name: agent_ata
docs: Agent's ATA that holds the NFT - proves signer owns the agent identity.
Required for AgentOwnerSigned mode (DelegateV1).
Optional for CounterpartySigned mode (ReputationScore).

accounts.name: token_program
docs: Token-2022 program for ATA verification.
Required when agent_ata is provided.

accounts.name: delegation_attestation
docs: Delegation attestation (optional).
Required when signer != agent ATA owner for AgentOwnerSigned mode.
Must be a valid DelegateV1 SAS attestation proving the signer's delegation.

accounts.name: clock
docs: Clock sysvar for delegation expiry verification.
Required when delegation_attestation is provided.

accounts.name: sas_program
docs: SAS program

instructions.name: initialize
docs: Initialize the SATI registry.
Validates a pre-initialized TokenGroup mint and stores registry configuration.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Initial registry authority (will be multisig in production)

accounts.name: registry_config
docs: Registry configuration PDA

accounts.name: group_mint
docs: TokenGroup mint - created and initialized by client, then finalized here

instructions.name: link_evm_address
docs: Link an EVM address to an agent via secp256k1 signature verification.
Proves the agent owner controls the specified EVM address.

accounts.name: owner
docs: Agent owner (must sign)

accounts.name: agent_mint
docs: Agent mint account

accounts.name: ata
docs: Owner's associated token account for this mint
Validated to be correct ATA for the agent_mint and have balance > 0

accounts.name: token_program
docs: Token-2022 program for ATA verification

instructions.name: register_agent
docs: Register a new agent in the SATI registry.
Creates a Token-2022 NFT with TokenMetadata and TokenGroupMember extensions.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Pays for account creation

accounts.name: owner
docs: Agent NFT owner (default: payer)

accounts.name: registry_config
docs: Registry configuration

accounts.name: group_mint
docs: TokenGroup mint (for membership)

accounts.name: agent_mint
docs: New agent NFT mint (randomly generated keypair)

accounts.name: agent_token_account
docs: Owner's ATA for agent NFT

accounts.name: agent_index
docs: Agent index PDA for enumeration by member_number
NOTE: Uses (current_count + 1) which equals the new total_agents after increment

instructions.name: register_schema_config
docs: Register a schema configuration. Authority only.
Creates a SchemaConfig PDA that determines signature mode and storage type.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Payer for account creation

accounts.name: registry_config
docs: Registry config - validates authority and checks mutability

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority that can register schemas (validated against registry_config)

accounts.name: schema_config
docs: Schema config PDA to be created

instructions.name: update_registry_authority
docs: Update or renounce registry authority.
Pass None to renounce (makes registry immutable).

accounts.name: authority
docs: Current authority (must sign)

accounts.name: registry_config
docs: Registry configuration

errors.name: InvalidGroupMint
errors.msg: Invalid group mint - must be owned by Token-2022 with TokenGroup extension

errors.name: MintAuthorityNotRenounced
errors.msg: Failed to renounce mint authority - supply guarantee violated

errors.name: InvalidSignatureCount
errors.msg: Invalid signature count for signature mode

errors.name: StorageTypeNotSupported
errors.msg: Storage type not supported for this operation

errors.name: AttestationDataTooSmall
errors.msg: Attestation data too small (minimum 130 bytes for universal base layout)

errors.name: SignatureMismatch
errors.msg: Signature pubkey does not match expected account

errors.name: AgentAtaMintMismatch
errors.msg: Agent ATA mint does not match token_account in attestation data

errors.name: AgentAtaEmpty
errors.msg: Agent ATA is empty - signer does not own the agent NFT

errors.name: AgentAtaRequired
errors.msg: Agent ATA required for this signature mode

errors.name: AttestationNotCloseable
errors.msg: Attestation cannot be closed for this schema

errors.name: MissingSignatures
errors.msg: Missing required Ed25519 signatures in transaction

errors.name: MessageMismatch
errors.msg: Message hash mismatch - signature was for different data

errors.name: DuplicateSigners
errors.msg: Duplicate signers not allowed for dual signature mode

errors.name: Ed25519InstructionNotFound
errors.msg: No Ed25519 instruction found in transaction

errors.name: AgentSignatureNotFound
errors.msg: Agent's Ed25519 signature not found (message content mismatch)

errors.name: CounterpartySignatureNotFound
errors.msg: Counterparty's Ed25519 signature not found (message content mismatch)

errors.name: OwnerOnly
errors.msg: Schema requires owner signature but delegate attempted

errors.name: DelegationAttestationRequired
errors.msg: Delegate signed but no delegation attestation provided

errors.name: InvalidDelegationPDA
errors.msg: Delegation attestation PDA doesn't match expected derivation

errors.name: DelegateMismatch
errors.msg: Delegation attestation delegate doesn't match signer

errors.name: AgentMintMismatch
errors.msg: Delegation attestation agent doesn't match target agent

errors.name: DelegationOwnerMismatch
errors.msg: Delegation was created by different owner (NFT was transferred)

errors.name: EvmAddressMismatch
errors.msg: EVM address mismatch - recovered address does not match expected

errors.name: InvalidEvmAddressRecovery
errors.msg: Failed to extract EVM address from secp256k1 key recovery

types.name: AgentIndex
docs: Agent index for enumeration via member_number.
Enables listing all agents without external indexing.
PDA seeds: [b"agent_index", member_number.to_le_bytes()]

fields.name: mint
docs: Agent mint address

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

types.name: AttestationClosed
docs: Emitted when an attestation is closed

fields.name: sas_schema
docs: SAS schema address

fields.name: token_account
docs: Agent's MINT ADDRESS (stable identity). Named `token_account` for SAS compatibility.

fields.name: address
docs: Attestation address that was closed

types.name: AttestationCreated
docs: Emitted when an attestation is created (compressed or regular)

fields.name: sas_schema
docs: SAS schema address

fields.name: token_account
docs: Agent's MINT ADDRESS (stable identity). Named `token_account` for SAS compatibility.

fields.name: counterparty
docs: Counterparty (client for Feedback, validator for Validation, provider for ReputationScore)

fields.name: storage_type
docs: Storage type used

fields.name: address
docs: Attestation address (Light address for compressed, PDA for regular)

types.name: CloseParams
docs: Parameters for closing a compressed attestation
Uses Light Protocol types directly for proof and account metadata,
following the recommended pattern from Light SDK.

fields.name: current_data
docs: Current attestation data (for hash verification)

fields.name: num_signatures
docs: Number of signatures in the attestation

fields.name: signature1
docs: First signature (required)

fields.name: signature2
docs: Second signature (zeroed for single-signature modes)

fields.name: address
docs: The compressed account address being closed (for event emission)

fields.name: proof
docs: Light Protocol validity proof

fields.name: account_meta
docs: Light Protocol compressed account metadata

fields.name: tree_info
docs: Merkle tree context.

fields.name: address
docs: Address.

fields.name: output_state_tree_index
docs: Output merkle tree index.

types.name: CreateParams
docs: Parameters for creating a compressed attestation
Uses Light Protocol types directly for proof and address tree info,
following the recommended pattern from Light SDK.

fields.name: data
docs: Schema-conformant data bytes (130+ bytes, universal base layout)

fields.name: output_state_tree_index
docs: Output state tree index for the new compressed account

fields.name: proof
docs: Light Protocol validity proof (None for new address creation)

fields.name: address_tree_info
docs: Light Protocol address tree info

types.name: CreateRegularParams
docs: Parameters for creating a regular (SAS) attestation
Used for Delegation schemas (AgentOwnerSigned mode)

fields.name: data
docs: Schema-conformant data bytes (130+ bytes, universal base layout)

fields.name: expiry
docs: Expiry timestamp (0 = never expires)

types.name: EvmAddressLinked
docs: Emitted when an EVM address is linked to an agent

fields.name: agent_mint
docs: Agent mint address

fields.name: evm_address
docs: EVM address (20 bytes)

fields.name: chain_id
docs: CAIP-2 chain identifier (e.g., "eip155:1")

fields.name: linked_at
docs: Unix timestamp when linked

types.name: LinkEvmAddressParams
docs: Parameters for linking an EVM address to a SATI agent.

fields.name: evm_address
docs: EVM address (20 bytes)

fields.name: chain_id
docs: CAIP-2 chain identifier (e.g., "eip155:1", "eip155:8453")

fields.name: signature
docs: secp256k1 signature (64 bytes: r || s)

fields.name: recovery_id
docs: Recovery ID (0 or 1)

types.name: MetadataEntry
docs: Metadata key-value pair for agent registration
Used as instruction argument (Anchor-compatible)

types.name: RegistryConfig
docs: Registry configuration account
PDA seeds: [b"registry"]

fields.name: group_mint
docs: SATI TokenGroup mint address

fields.name: authority
docs: Authority that can update registry settings
Set to Pubkey::default() to make immutable

fields.name: total_agents
docs: Total agents registered (counter)

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed (stored for efficient CPI signing)

types.name: SchemaConfig
docs: Schema configuration for a registered attestation type.
PDA seeds: ["schema_config", sas_schema]

fields.name: sas_schema
docs: SAS schema address this config applies to

fields.name: signature_mode
docs: Signature verification mode

fields.name: storage_type
docs: Storage backend type

fields.name: delegation_schema
docs: Schema for delegation verification.
If Some: owner OR valid delegate can sign (AgentOwnerSigned mode).
If None: only owner can sign (or anyone for CounterpartySigned mode).

fields.name: closeable
docs: Whether attestations can be closed/nullified

fields.name: name
docs: Schema name for signing messages (max 32 chars)

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

types.name: SchemaConfigRegistered
docs: Emitted when a schema config is registered

fields.name: schema
docs: SAS schema address

fields.name: signature_mode
docs: Signature mode (DualSignature, CounterpartySigned, or AgentOwnerSigned)

fields.name: storage_type
docs: Storage type (Compressed or Regular)

fields.name: delegation_schema
docs: Schema for delegation verification (None = owner only)

fields.name: closeable
docs: Whether attestations can be closed

fields.name: name
docs: Human-readable schema name (max 32 chars)

types.name: SignatureMode
docs: Signature mode determines how many signatures are required and who signs

types.name: StorageType
docs: Storage type determines where attestations are stored
